summary.para: Gets the corresponding interface slot for a variable that represents an interface pointer.

param.name: uArrayIndex
param.para: Index of the array element to get the slot number for. For a non-array variable this value will be zero.

returns.para: Returns the index of the interface in the interface array.

remarks.para: GetInterfaceSlot gets the corresponding slot in a dynamic linkage array for an interface instance. The returned slot number is used to set an interface instance to a particular class instance. See the HLSL Interfaces and Classes overview for additional information.
